title: 148 - Brahn's Back!
description: As Ty and Connor are away on their Florida work trip the rest of the boys on The Pod hold it down for todays episode. We open it up with an update on Bald Bill's solo hit and run investigation along with an update on how everyones been doing. The boys jump right into what they have been watching lately. Next comes the infamous Pod Fod which Mitt tried to name all of the characters off his "favorite" show Friends, an update on Monkeys Daily twitter, Cat's jumping from 6 story windows and much more from the wild web. Make sure to subscribe to YouTube.com/thepodpmi to watch every episode and send your submissions for the Pod Fod to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. Thank you all for listening, have a great weekend, we'll see you Wednesday.
